website_summaries.verdict: Sleepers may struggle during the break-in period of this mattress, which starts out firm and can irritate stiff hips.
pros: An all-memory foam mattress that is nonetheless firm and supportive
Shifting position is easy, and sleepers don’t sink too deeply into the mattress
Provides firm support for back sleepers and moderate support for side sleepers, depending on weight
Expands within 24 hours after unboxing with very little chemical smell
cons: Indentations show up in the foam after just a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: This bed is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously I have nothing bad to say about this bed. Arrived earlier than expected, easy to set up, expanded right away and it feels amazing! Slept so comfortable! If you’re considering this bed... just do it! You will not regret it!!!
customer_reviews.author: simplyxcrissy

customer_reviews.title: HARDEST MATTRESS!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the hardest mattress I’ve ever been on! Looks amazing. Quality is good. If you want your mattress to conform to your body then it’s not for you! I am 5’4, 140 lbs and the mattres doesn’t give at all! So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joy L.

customer_reviews.title: I am a side sleeper and this was hard for me to get comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: First of all I am not paid to make do this review. I bought this mattress after I read the reviews and I must say this mattress is very firm. I had to my a pillow top mattress pad just to soften this mattress a little. I am a side sleeper and this was hard for me to get comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE ONE!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this is the best bed I have ever slept on. Slightly firm but I like that. My wife and I are separated nearly 100 lbs and there is no dip on the other side. It holds your position quite nicely! This bed is SUPER COOL when sleeping. Not hot at all. I had a Queen Lucid cooling gel memory foam mattress I bought 2 years ago. It ran HOT and was horrible quality. This mattress is great quality and inflated fully within 30 minutes. It moved around tight corners nicely also. Highly recommend 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony W

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this bed
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bed, I am a big guy 6'3 300lbs and I fit comfortable on it and it forms to body. I haven't been able to sleep well, and with this bed I feel like I'm sleeping on a cloud. Highly recommend this bed and I will most likely buy another one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Lantz

customer_reviews.title: If you enjoy sleeping on the ground this is the mattress for you!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is basically the same as sleeping on the floor. Plus, it’s super cool to figure out how to “box up” a queen size mattress.
customer_reviews.author: tina schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous buying a matress on Amazon. What if I don't like it? What if it's uncomfortable? What if, what if, what if?! But I bought it. And it was the best thing I could have done! It's very comfortable! It isn't very firm. It does form right to your body. But it feels great and supports everything.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: FIBERGLASS
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, the bed in made out of fiberglass, it's horribly hard to get rid of the shard.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is too firm and very uncomfortable. Not plush at all. It's triggering my sciatica. I am waking up in pain. I am going to buy a mattress pad to see if it helps. UPDATE 3/14/19: Bought a gel 2 inch mattress topper. It made it 10% more comfortable. I am still having back issues. If you suffer from back issues DO NOT PURCHASE. I have lost my money on this. Will eventually get rid of it and purchase a different mattress. Very unhappy customer.
customer_reviews.author: mariceli

customer_reviews.title: No more back pain!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. I’m 5’4” 152 lbs and my husband is 5’11” 207 lbs and we both suffered from horrible back pain caused by our previous mattress. Since we got this mattress, over 3 months ago, we have been PAIN free! I wake up feel rested which is a relief since I work nights and desperately need my sleep. So glad that I took the chance and bought this mattress. It’s really good quality and I feel it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ashcat4228

customer_reviews.title: Beware of fiberglass!!
customer_reviews.text: Shards of fiberglass WILL GET EVERYWHERE. I took the cover of the mattress off to wash, and while doing so shards of fiberglass from the protective cover got all over my room. I had to throw away many pieces of clothing, sheets and my comforter because it the fiberglass was so badly intertwined in the fabric. I’m so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: francesca

customer_reviews.title: Firm
customer_reviews.text: Love it when my 300 pound wife goes to the kitchen i dont wake up
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Firm Mattress - Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased a highly rated 10" memory foam mattress on Amazon. I loved it at first, but it only lasted about a year before I began having back pain. As a result, I began my search for a firmer mattress that hopefully will last longer. I'm 6' tall 250 lbs and barely sink into it. Believe me when I say this is a very firm mattress, probably more so than most would prefer. Actually, it's pretty much what I was looking for. I figure it's better to have too firm, which can be remedied with a topper, than too plush. Overall, it seems good for the price. I just hope it lasts longer than it's predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Klosterman

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress, it's my first time ordering by mail and a compressed mattress. Would highly recommend this brand and product. It expanded as soon as plastic wrapping was removed, fun to watch and no need to wait 24 to 48 hrs. As in other brands. It is so comfortable and comes with a beautiful zippered cover on it that is washable. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Ultra firm...box does NOT have wheels :(
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice, comfortable... but yeah it’s crazy firm. We were used to an older spring mattress so it was a big change. After a month of use it’s pretty darn comfortable. Only thing is it is not very breathable. We actually ended up getting a cool foam topper to circumvent that. Also...my wife wants me to make sure EVERYONE knows that the box does not have wheels. It was not fun getting it in the house OR getting it up the stairs... the video totally shows wheels on the box and it’s a bummer that it doesn’t
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: Just OPENED ITEM after moving
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item when it was on sale...keep in storage until we moved, so return date is past... So, buyers beware...this has ZERO support and is absolutely a piece of junk...if you can lay in the middle of the bed, you might not role off. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM...EVER!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: schamil

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sleeping with this mattress.Worth the price compare with major mattress stores.Definitely recommend.Its firm and comfortable sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo de Messi

customer_reviews.title: If you want soft, this mattress isn't it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 12" plush memory foam mattress. It is FAR from plush. I ordered this to get away from my hard coil spring mattress, and this one isn't any more comfortable than my original mattress.
customer_reviews.author: kris lerschen

customer_reviews.title: would have given it a 5 but it did not ...
customer_reviews.text: would have given it a 5 but it did not come in the box on wheels as promised and i could not carry it up the stairs.could not use it until i found someone to bring the 70 pound box upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Bad ,  just bad !!!
customer_reviews.text: At first the bed wasn’t so bad but after about 2 weeks I noticed I was waking up with severe back pain. I would toss and turn all night. Also the middle started to sink so when my husband was close to middle I would roll toward him because it sank so much. We are small I am 120 lbs and husband is only 160 so it’s not like weight played a role in the sinking. This is the worst bed I’ve ever slept in. So disappointed that I lost money buying this bed.
customer_reviews.author: A Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: It's quite amazing to watch inflate. The mattress is very deep, so you might need new sheets.It is a tad too firm for me, so I bought a topper and now it's perfect. A great value for a brand new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Blackcanoe

customer_reviews.title: Super hard firm mattress.
customer_reviews.text: We tried breaking into the mattress, but it never soften up. Super firm.
customer_reviews.author: Josue Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like that the bed is hypoallergenic and at a good price, but I can't say that the mattress is comfortable. Unless I sleep in this bed a certain way with my head at a certain level I wake up with my back just absolutely screaming at me and it feels like my spine is about to snap when I try shifting my weight or moving to a new position to rest in. I figured since it was still new that it needs time to be broken in, but its been several months now and I wake up constantly throughout the night because of the problems it causes my back to have.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: NOT TOO FIRM
customer_reviews.text: i am very confused as to why so many people are saying this mattress is too firm. it is not too firm at all in my opinion. it is just right. i am 5'7'' 150 pounds. i think it is really comfortable. it is how a mattress should be. i tried another memory foam mattress from amazon, which also had many good reviews, but it was way TOO soft. i woke up with my back hurting. if you are someone with back pain or issues i highly recommend this bed. the firmness is supportive. any softer will hurt your back.
customer_reviews.author: cour

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a Rock! Light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is horrible! Not only is it hard as a rock, its super light, and memory foam should be dense and heavy, but when you go to get in bed because its so light, the mattress will slide right off the boxspring. Spend more, get a good quality mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pinter

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: It was too firm, had to return it and get a different mattress. The the return process was amazing, since it was opened I was concerned how I would be able to return it but they offered pick up service, very easy process.
customer_reviews.author: Kany Mirza

customer_reviews.title: So very Hard!
customer_reviews.text: Okay...I have given this mattress 5 months. It is the Worst, hardest mattress I have ever owned! Unfortunately, I gave away my Serta, pillow top mattress. :( Now, I have had to buy a new mattress. If you have slightly boney hips, or don't like sleeping on a Board....DO NOT get this mattress!. Absolutely awful! If this is Ashley's Best...I can not even imagine what their worst is! Don't buy this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Hooton

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this item... arrived on time, a little heavy to bring upstairs on my own but at 60 years old (woman) it wasn’t impossible. Cut the outer plastic from the mattress, put it on the base and it was ready for sheets and and comforter. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very firm, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a firm, and boy is it firm. Unfortunately, it's just too firm for me. But, that isnt why it's a three star. The chemical smell still hasn't gone away after 4 weeks. I have had memory foam before but, this one really tends to warm up fast at night. Even with my cooling topper, cooling mattress pad and sheets I wake up very warm. The mattress was easy to remove from the packaging, it did not take long to form and is not very heavy compared to my old memory foam but it's super dense like a firm mattress should be. I'm hoping it softens a little more as I sleep on it more.
customer_reviews.author: Wiseapples

customer_reviews.title: No more sleepless nights!
customer_reviews.text: We were nervous ordering a mattress online. However, we couldn’t pass up the good deal during the holidays. We sure glad we took a chance! We’ve been sleeping on it for over 3 weeks now, and OMG! I wake up each morning feeling rested! No more tossing and turning in the middle of the night due to being uncomfortable from a spring mattress! Best of all, when any one of us wakes up and leaves the bed, we don’t feel a thing. This mattress is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Junnel TEXAS

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but broke down quickly.
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame because this bed is so comfortable! It supports your body just the right amount and we had no trouble adjusting to sleeping well in this bed. It definitely does sleep warm so if that's something you struggle with, I would suggest you find a bed with cooling gel. Unfortunately, after just a few months with this bed one side began to lose it's shape and cave in. Now we have to rotate the bed every few weeks so one of us isn't having to roll off the edge while sleeping. If the bed hadn't lost its shape, I'd say this has been the best sleep we've had in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Still smells after 2.5 months. Is extremeley lightweight so it can move off of frame if not careful. Its starting to break down already, so longevity is not expexted.
customer_reviews.author: REP

customer_reviews.title: Great height, comfort, and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was so afraid about the quality of this bed initially, but I am so happy with purchase. I lived in NYC for a year and all my friends bought their mattresses from Amazon (linen spa, angle something lol). I was so confused with comfort, because I've always bought a mattress in store from a brand like Serta or something. This bed is comfortable, sturdy, memory foam, and I don't have back problems when I wake up. I'm also going to purchase this mattress for the bed in my room at my parent's house lol. I want to sleep good everywhere I go lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Mc

customer_reviews.title: No wheels on box
customer_reviews.text: Although I absolutely love the mattress, I have to point out that the cardboard box it came in did NOT have wheels or a handle, as advertised in the video. The mattress is extremely heavy (70lbs), and I had to drag it on the floor because I expected "no lifting" to be required, as the ad clearly indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Maria S

customer_reviews.title: Best value for anyone looking for memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: It's been two months since buying this mattress and I have no complaints! There weren't any strong odors upon opening but we did let it "air" out for 24 hours just in case. I was worried that it was gonna be soft like a memory foam pillow but it's definitely on the firm side. The good thing about it being firmer than soft is that you could always buy a softer mattress topper to your liking :)
customer_reviews.author: hawaiist

customer_reviews.title: really hard mattress
customer_reviews.text: like all the other reviews this mattress is really stiff the only reason i bought this because it was on sale now i’m stuck with a cheap mattress please guys don’t go the cheap way like i did don’t say i didn’t warn you
customer_reviews.author: manny

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was so disappointing after reading all the over 5k reviews. It just did not work for me. Back pain and the most uncomfortable sleep no matter what sleep position. Toss and turn all night. Everything aches from neck to hips and I have no known medical/physiology issues. Sorry I was hoping for the best. I even put a 6 in. gel foam pad on top of this mattress after several weeks of use and still is an unforgiving bed. Sleeping on the floor is comparable in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Sandoe

customer_reviews.title: I had doubts, but now I tell everyone
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’5” 300lbs - it’s holding up wonderfully. I’m a big “you get what you pay for” kind of person, but I’ve got to tell ya.... this bed sleeps better than all other beds I’ve owned. I’ve purchased 2 $3,000 beds and I’ll never make that mistake again, this one is far superior, and far cheaper. It’s light weight (comparatively,) it sleeps wonderfully, it doesn’t stink, it’s firm yet plush. Unpacking was easy, it was ready to go in a day. I don’t have a single bad thing to say about it. If you’re on the fence, hop down into the BUY pasture.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Mattress!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the wrong mattress was delivered. I just moved in and waited one week. When it arrived I was at work and my kids did not know the difference and unboxed it while I was at work. It seemed odd to be when o got home because it looked so different. The box is now outside and in the trash because my kids wanted to surprise me. Either way this one that came in was a spring mattress and was not foam at all !! I really wish it was picked Correctly to begin with and I feel deceived and I am hoping it was an honest mistake !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Hoping my body adjusts to like this mattress
customer_reviews.text: 09/05/19: The morning after my first night sleeping on this mattress has me wondering what their return policy is. The mattress is very, very hard. I'm a side sleeper; specifically a left side sleeper. My left hip was hurting from what I assumed was from my old mattress. This mattress doesn't give enough support to allow comfortable side sleeping. It's like sleeping on the floor. I will update this review of things improve. 09/13/19: I was glad to learn that I have a total of 97 days to return this. It's still not very comfortable for my position as a slide sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: ThePoppie225

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 10''. It's rock hard! I didn't even know they could make mattresses this hard. There is literally no give at all. I am not a very picky sleeper, I can sleep on bare ground in a tent but this is terrible! I have been waiting 2 days for the seller to get back to me with a response as to if/how I return this god forsaken thing! Amazon can't do anything since it comes from a third party seller. I don't know if the 12" is different and that's where all the positive reviews came from but I wouldn't recommend the 10"! You'd be better off sleeping on a piece of plywood.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: A great night sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about ordering this since I read some mixed reviews and finally decided to. I’m so glad I did. Highly satisfied. Great quality, firm mattress and my back is so happy. It was super easy to unbox and it took 3 hours or so before I slept on it. This mattress made me realize how bad, and way too soft, my old one was. The first night I slept on it, I woke up with no back pain. It is firm yet memory foam comfort. If you’re used to extra pillow top etc this is not the mattress for you! I’m beyond pleased with this purchase especially the price! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SNMS

customer_reviews.title: Back pain
customer_reviews.text: Worst mattress ever!!! Do yourself a favor and do not buy. My partner and I both have severe back pain after sleeping on this mattress. Spend a little more money and get yourself a quality mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Melody & Marli

customer_reviews.title: Firm but not rock hard.
customer_reviews.text: The people who gave this mattress low ratings and said it was like sleeping on concrete are not correct. The mattress is firm, but there is a bit of give on the upper layer. I was actually hoping that were correct because I need a mattress that is very hard because of my back problems. I think most people would like this mattress if you want something fairly firm. This is definitely not for plush mattress lovers though. Surprisingly mine was fully inflated in less than an hour. I aired out the bedroom overnight the day I got it and do not recall a significant smell after that.
customer_reviews.author: Chariti J. Free

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly hard mattress with no give
customer_reviews.text: Mattress came quickly and it was extremely easy to unpack, unroll, and get it set up where I wanted it. It was ready to sleep on by the same night it was delivered. I am however disappointed that it is as hard as a rock. The description states medium firmness, but this is false. There is zero give to this mattress. It doesn't contour to the body, nor does it provide a relaxing night of sleep. I will have to end up buying a mattress topper. And because I couldn't box it back up, I was unable to return this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: blue_iz1220

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Dissatisfied. I have had this mattress since June. Decided to give it some time before writing a review. This is the worst mattress, I'm in my 20's and now have terrible stiff necks and back pains due to this mattress and the lack of sleep I get from it. I guess you get what you pay for. Do not buy this mattress
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Gurley

customer_reviews.title: Update mold
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buying a matress online but took the risk best money spent the quality is great its firm and comfy and it says to allow hrs to fully expand as soon as i took it out the package literally 1/2 min later it was fully expanded and when i layed on it it just felt great its thick and im just in love Update I took off the protectors to wash just to keep things clean after I turned the mattress around just to check I found mold in the mattress it’s disappointing because I keep sheets covers clean also my mattress has a thick mattress protector so there was no reason for it to have mold
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Rock Hard!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst bed i have ever slept on! Honestly don't do it. We had to get put of bed at 1/am and switch mattresses back from our spare room because it was so bad. My fingers actually went numb from side sleeping on my shoulder that felt like it was on a rock. You could put 1000 pounds on it and it would still not give. What a waste of money. I listened to the 5 star reviews. I hope you don't make that mistake. we are giving it to charity.
customer_reviews.author: Bless The Lord

customer_reviews.title: 8" Twin Mattress description is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I purchased this mattress over one at the big box wholesaler was that the dimensions listed for the 8" twin mattress was 37" W x 74" D x 8". I specifically was looking for a mattress that was 37"W. I received a twin mattress that was 38"W. I would urge the seller to please update the item description because what you have inaccurate. Had I known I was getting a 38"W mattress, I would have purchased it from the big box wholesaler because right now, that mattress if $30 cheaper than this one.
customer_reviews.author: mariahdez

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT THAT HARD!
customer_reviews.text: I used a Tuft and Needle mattress for 2 years and wanted something with a bit more support. I have read a lot of reviews on this saying the mattress is as hard as the floor, and I can attest that it's not that extreme. There is definitely some give! It's not the 'sink, plush' kind of feeling, but you WILL feel like you're sleeping on a mattress that gives you enough support for your posture. That's exactly what I'm looking for. Whoever posted the pictures of their hand exerting pressures on the mattress - THANK YOU because it's true and it helps me purchase the mattress, and I love it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Hoang Nam Nguyen Vu

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is extremely firm, to the point of having almost no give at all. It seems to compress about maybe 1” at areas of pressure, and even with time it never seemed to “break in” or get any softer. I am 130 pounds and it does not sink in at all. If you are a side sleeper, don’t even consider this mattress. This may work for a back sleeper if you prefer the feeling of sleeping on the ground. I would not recommend this at all, don’t waste your money on this foam brick.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: NOT PLUSH
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT plush. It’s a firm mattress, if you like firmer mattresses then this is for you. I was looking for a soft cushion-ie one and I made the mistake of buying this. You get what you paid for ! The seller also doesn’t do returns so definitely don’t buy it to try it either!! It’s like laying on a tanning bed with a towel!!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Not for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: First week: Severe back and hip pain. After a week it's ok. 2 inches of soft memory foam and basically rock hard foam underneath. Not great if you sleep on your side. Box was really beat up but mattress arrived clean. My old air mattress is more comfortable. Almost feels like I put 2 inches of memory foam on a concrete floor. 12 inch queen.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Bury

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I thought the price was right. In the description it's a 12" memory foam mattress. It is a coil mattress with memory foam on top. It's comfortable enough but when you're expecting something like a tempurpedic, it's nothing like one. The sides when you go to get out they aren't very sturdy. I bought it for my bed and breakfast so it's not something I'm going to be using myself. I hope the guests like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Didnt come in boxing as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Upset that the mattress didnt come in the original boxing that others received and advertised. The plastic it was wrapped in was already ripping in some areas and you can see the mattress was dirty in the exposed spots. Mattress has a very strong odor
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've waited six months to write this review, because you can't really judge a mattress until your butt has had time to mold it a bit. After my six month testing period, I'm giving this five stars. It's really comfortable, and shockingly supportive for the price. I was kind of just expecting a throw-away mattress that I'd use for a year or two based on what it cost, but it's actually really, really nice. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Horrible chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: There is a really strong chemical smell. The mattress itself in terms of comfort is what is to be expected with a cheap mattress but the smell is almost unbearable. We’ve aired out our daughters room while the bed was fluffing up and that didn’t seem to help. It almost has a paint smell to it. Even with room sprays and clean linens, the smell is strong. After going through and reading the negative reviews closer, I wouldn’t have bought this mattress based on the horrific smell and the potential of the mattress containing fiberglass. Go to an actual mattress store and spend the few extra dollars to save yourself some grief.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are big, this is your foam mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I've waited about a month to write a review. I'm 6'2", 330lbs. This is the perfect amount of give for me. It's comfy as hell and I don't toss and turn anymore, even with a herniated disk between my L1 and L2. My partner doesn't feel me move at all when he stays over. If you're a big person or you have back issues don't be deterred by the "too firm" reviews. It's perfect for you. One drawback would be that the outgassing lasted for a while but it's not the most unpleasant smell, smells like new paint.
customer_reviews.author: KXMHM

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable Bed!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the full size bed to use in our camper. We were so excited about getting a new bed and I read the reviews and felt good about our purchase. We have slept on it maybe four times and it was so terrible this last weekend. I'm a side/stomach sleeper and I could not get good sleep. Nor could my husband. I woke up achy and sore in my shoulders, neck and hips? It is very hard and has zero give. We would love to know how or if we could do something about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M.

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough, happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I had a $4,500 sleep number that i returned, and I bought this to hold us over in the mean time while we figured oit our next move... A separate $150 foam mattresses topper on top of this Ashley mattress worked wonders for me! After lots of problems and an insanely expensive sleep number did not solve, I was sleeping pretty well! I’m blown away! In my opinion, it’s somewhat firm. I honestly don’t know how anyone says is soft. I could maybe understand medium at best... the mattress topper fixed it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Firm is RIGHT! Hard as a rock. Woke up in pain.
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. How on earth can you return something that expands like a balloon? This mattress was for my son's room and he said it was so hard, that we switched and I slept on this mattress to test it out. I slept on it for a good week and every morning, I woke up in pain - it is that hard. So I dragged it into our office and bought a foam mattress topper so it's usable as a guest mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Ivapeeva

customer_reviews.title: Dang, it's no good guys. :/
customer_reviews.text: Waited a few months to leave a review because of course the first few weeks it wI'll always be "good". Little further along and well it's bad. Really disapointed, all I want is a good bed and a decent nights sleep without back pain. No luck here. However, amazon was great at refunding us, off to try another. DO NOT RECOMMEND TO ANYONE
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Mosmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews say this bed is as hard as a rock. Well I disagree, however I can see why they would say that. This bed absorbs bounce great! I used to have to kick my dog off the bed for scratching. Now I dont even notice. If I dive into the bed it doesn't bounce back it absorbs it all. So it kinda seems stuff because of that. From my experience it curves around my boney hips when I side sleep and its great on my back. I have not found myself sleeping on my stomach anymore! Which is great for my neck!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Waaaaay too hot!
customer_reviews.text: I dont like this mattress at all. I feel exhausted all the time because I haven't had a good night's sleep in weeks since setting this up in my bedroom. It's supposed to have some cooling qualities and I wake up in a pool of sweat every morning and multiple times a night. I had another memory foam mattress that was a little hot but this one is unbearable. This also causes me to have to change/wash the sheets multiple times a week and I sweat so much on this that it ruins my pillows too. I've tried sleeping with the a/c on, the windows open, blanket, just a sheet nothing works. Really, really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Hinkydoo

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I have several debilitating conditions that mainly occur during sleep. My Dr suggested a new memory foam mattress to take pressure off certain areas of my body. I had a $7k Tempurpedic Bed for 15 years, it was way too old. I replaced it with this mattress for $200 and I am now sleeping through the night, with limited pain/cramps. You spend most of your life in bed. This is the best investment you can make.
customer_reviews.author: Trent C.

customer_reviews.title: Scary uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this product has so many positive reviews. I was super excited when it came in, and it came up to size almost instantly. After giving it a full day, we laid down on it and immediately realized we had made a terrible mistake. This thing isn’t firm... it’s brick like lol! We laughed so hard because we could not believe this was advertised as medium firm. Of course Amazon handled the return process flawlessly but I would not buy this mattress unless you want something that feels similar to sleeping on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is great! I almost bought. $1000 dollar mattress, and I’m so glad I didn’t. This mattress is comfortable, easy to set up, and gives good support! I bought the firm and unless you specifically need something super soft, I think this is the best. You can sit on the edge without it sinking and there’s like no movement transfer. I switched sides after 6 months, and it feels great there too. I’m very happy with this buy; especially since I was nervous about buying online. Some of my friends made fun of me for buying a “cheap” mattress, but I have no regrets and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tesler

customer_reviews.title: This mattress blew my expectations out of the water!
customer_reviews.text: We were nervous about buying a mattress online. We’ve had this since January and we are in love with it! It took just a couple of nights to get used to it, and now I can’t imagine going back to a traditional mattress and box springs. I would give it 100 stars if I could. We bought this platform to go with it and it fits perfectly and looks amazing. Zero complaints. Can’t recommend this enough. Zinus Dori Upholstered Square Stitched Wingback Platform Bed / Mattress Foundation / Easy Assembly / Strong Wood Slat Support, King
customer_reviews.author: jcwittman

customer_reviews.title: This is not a fireproofed mattress.  Strong, lingering chemical smell that went away in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for the guest bedroom. The first thing I noticed when I unpacked it was a very strong chemical smell (which dissipated in about 2 weeks). The next thing I noticed was a small paper insert that said that the mattress was NOT fire retardant, NOT fire resistant and advised people not to PUT THEIR PHONES ON THE BED WHILE CHARGING THEM because the warmth from the charger might cause a fire. This information is NOWHERE in the listing. It's a bit terrifying. I wound up getting a flame retardant mattress cover and using that but I would not buy this mattress again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Zero

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, really great price.
customer_reviews.text: We moved from a Serta Pillow Top to this. Did a lot of research and this seemed like a great product especially for the price. We have had it a few months and have zero complaints. No weird smells. Just sat the mattress on the box spring and slept on the old mattress in the living room while it ‘popped up.’ You’ll need deep pocket sheets and a mattress cover, naturally. My fiancé said his back pain has been reduced greatly. Usually don’t purchase Ashley anything as I don’t think it lasts that long, but we’re happy with this now, time will tell; for the price I’m pleasantly surprised. Came in a tall thin box.
customer_reviews.author: Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Yes this mattress is firm. Like for serious don’t-jump-into-bed-you’ll-blacken-your-eye firm. I have been sleeping on a super squish ikea pillow top nightmare for 4 years, I found out this year I’ve got scoliosis and my mattress was doing more harm than good. So bye pillow top cesspool of sadness! Hello Uber affordable and hella supportive chime mattress. I threw a mattress topper on it for a little bit of squish and to protect the mattress from my dogs, but this was worth every penny. Also not hard to unpackage, everybody complaining there’s no wheels on the box... it’s not heavy just cumbersome, you’ll live. I’m waking up refreshed for the first time in years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sleep I've Had In A Long Time
customer_reviews.text: Seems as though foam mattresses are being advertised on many medias. I opted to go with the Ashley 12" for two reasons. 1. I've owned Ashley furniture and the value for the dollar is excellent. 2. The description of the contents this mattress is comprised of made sense to me. I've used this mattress for about a month, and can honestly it all I hoped it would be. I arise each morning feeling fully rested and there are no aches I encountered with a traditional mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: I did a huge research before making my decision for this mattress and so far I’m extremely happy with it. I’ve been sleeping on it for about a month now, and it feels the same as the first night. It’s a firm mattress but it’s not a rock, when you first lay down you may feel like is to hard but as soon as your weight settles is like the mattress hugs your shape. I’m a 140lb woman and have no back pain or anything like that so I couldn’t say if it’s helpful for any particular condition but for me it was a GREAT purchase at a very fair price. Will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and firm, well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I had never purchased a mattress online before. I read one of the reviews here that said this is almost identical to an Ashley Elite memory foam mattress, and we just happen to live near an Ashley furniture store so we went down there to see what we thought and decicded to make the purchase. The other reviewer was spot-on, this is a fantastic mattress. Within about four hours it had inflated to its full size, and the firmness is perfect. Looking forward to less body aches in the morning! Time will tell how it holds up, but it was purchased for maybe 1/5th of the price that the inner spring mattress it replaced cost me about eight years ago.
customer_reviews.author: TomC8481

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who needed a new mattress. I tried it out and if you like a firmer but yet still "enveloping" feel of memory foam, this was great. My teenage son thinks its really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a memory foam mattress for about 5 years and wanted to get a Queen bed so I went with this one. It's very comfortable. Just note that it is 12" and turns into quite a tall bed if you have a box spring, too!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Wayyyyyy too firm.  Like...styrofoam firm.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it 2 stars is because technically it is as advertised.... which is ******* FIRM! I have a back injury, I had a ghost bed, and I was DYING every morning. So I was like, hey! I need something way more firm! Now that I have it, it's been over a week, and half way through the night, I am sleeping on the floor (and am pain free!). I would say it's like sleeping on a brick, but honestly, that may be more comfortable. I will be requesting a refund immediately. I'm tired of waking up in tears from excruciating back pain.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: It’s like sleeping on a concrete floor
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beyond firm! The packing for this bed was horrific! It came pretty much already opened for me! One cool thing was it had reached its full 12” expansion in just a few hour and there was no bad smell so I give them credit on that aspect! As far as sleeping on this bed I wanted a firm mattress because I have horrible back pain in my soft pillow top. But this thing was like sleeping directly on the floor with a rug as a mattress I will definitely be tarting the process of returning it ASAP! I would only recommend this to someone who enjoys sleeping on rocks! It does stay nice and cool at night!
customer_reviews.author: browdie wylie

customer_reviews.title: HARD AS A BRICK
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE SEVERE MUSCULOSKELETAL PAIN AND SORENESS AT TIMES DUE TO ARTHRITIS AND BACK SURGERY. I BOUGHT THIS THINKING IT WOULD GIVE ME RELIEF BECAUSE IT SAID "MEDIUM FIRM". WELL, ITS NOT A MEDIUM ANYTHING. THIS THING IS AS HARD A CONCRETE AND I DO NOT REST WELL ON IT AT ALL. MY OLD MATTRESS, WHICH IS A BEAUTYREST FIRM, PROVIDES BETTER REST AND SUPPORT THAN THIS ONE. ITS GOING ON THE GUEST BED AND I WILL JUST HAVE TO GET ANOTHER ONE (DIFFERENT BRAND) IN HOPES THAT IT WILL BE MORE COMFORTABLE. IT IS A LOVELY MATTRESS THOUGH AND IT CAME VERY WELL PACKAGED, EASY TO SET UP AND GOOD PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: Firm mattresses are for everyone. Now, hear me out. Soft mattresses wear out more quickly than firm mattresses. You can make a firm mattress softer, but you can't make a soft mattress firmer. Once that soft mattress begins to sag, it's Game Over. I prefer replacing a topper every 2-3 years, versus the entire mattress. If you love a firm mattress like me, this is perfect already. This is a bed you sleep on, not in. If you're a hot sleeper, that's important. Overall this bed is very high quality. There was no smell and it fluffed up in 30 minutes. I'm extremely satisfied and I'd recommend this mattress to others.
customer_reviews.author: ThrowinStacks

customer_reviews.title: Beware this bed is hard as A ROCK!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy myself a new mattress after my old mattress was giving me terrible back problems. I read good reviews and was overjoyed to make this purchase. HUGE MISTAKE!! This mattress is beyond firm! Very uncomfortable and I am a very heavy woman. I am 5’8” and I weigh roughly 370lbs and this bed is like sleeping on a rock! Even with my weight the mattress doesn’t “sink” or conform to my body. If you like a firm mattress this is the mattress for you, but if you like a softer plushy sleep like I do this is not the product for you. Now I will be purchasing a mattress topper to make this bed comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Eloise Long

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on concrete
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was so hard it worsened mine & my husband's back pain. We literally slept on this mattress four nights before putting our old mattress back on because we were so uncomfortable. The bed itself came in a nice box and had no chemical smell. It was also easy to setup BUT when we decided to return it we obviously couldn't fit it back into the box so I had to buy plastic to wrap it in AND the compantly charged ME for the return shipping ($40+). If you love a stiff bed this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M

customer_reviews.title: Going strong after a year+ use
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress for just over a year now. We were in the market for a new mattress due to my husband constantly waking up with back pain. Decided to take a big gamble on this box mattress after years of purchasing expensive coil ones. Thought that for the money it would be worth it even if it only lasted a little while. So far it's been great!! No back pain & no sleeping indentions in it. Only thing is kids complain when they fall on the bed b/c it's much firmer than old one. C'est la vive! We do not regret this purchase one bit & recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Spreadkindness

customer_reviews.title: VERY, VERY FIRM!!! Caused back pain!
customer_reviews.text: I was previously sleeping on a pillow top coil mattress and began having lower back pain. I thought a firmer mattress would help and I chose to try this memory foam, firm mattress by Ashley. This mattress is not for sissy’s...it is extremely FIRM!!! As for the reviews that state it isn’t firm enough....they must need concrete to sleep on!! It has added to my back trouble, I now have neck and shoulder pain. Before you purchase, be certain that you truly want a very FIRM mattress! I waited too long to send back and I really don’t k ow how I would have sent back but I’m selling this one and trying another coil mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'M SO HAPPY WITH THIS
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally sleep well... I have PTSD and anxiety... I hurt my back in Afghanistan. That being said, this is not a push for the military or sympathy. I just struggle to sleep. My body has been beat up... this mattress... has caused me to sleep 3 straight days of 9 hours uninterrupted sleep... it has been years since I've slept longer than 2 hours at any given time. My girlfriend is sleeping deeper as well. So comfortable and so worth every single penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Marc H. Smith Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on the Floor
customer_reviews.text: Wish I took the negative reviews seriously. This thing really feels like sleeping on the floor. I wake up with shoulder pain. If you ever sleep on the side this is not the bed for you.
customer_reviews.author: J. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Opened up with baby roach or bedbug!
customer_reviews.text: I opened it up only to find what I hope is a cockroach and not a bedbug! Will update review if this doesn’t turn into a situation .
customer_reviews.author: Heather freitas

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it will be perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use in a secondary bedroom. The previous reviews are what I used to make this decision. We have not slept on it but it seems to be very good quality and like all of these bed-in-a-box mattresses, it just inflates once you remove the final plastic wrap. You can pay a LOT more money and get the same quality. We are going to buy a second one for another bedroom. Our daughter is coming to visit in two weeks. That will be the first real test. If she has any negative comments, I'll post them. But if not, this review stands as is.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Life. Changing!
customer_reviews.text: I was about to spend tons of money on a chiropractor and new mattress, but purchased this queen 10" for my guest bedroom and haven't slept anywhere else since it got here last week. I have severe arthritis, sleep on my stomach, and have a very curved back. It is near impossible for me to get comfy but by day 2 with this mattress I found myself looking for reasons to just go chill in it. I am so happy with this purchase I've shared it with many others who need a firm but soft on the joints option. I will update this after time, but for now, this bed has changed my life, literally overnight!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on granite counters
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was soooooo excited for this bed because I like a firm mattress but this things is equivalent to sleeping on your countertops or the floor. Also, ours has an awful chemical odor that wont go away. We've given if several weeks to air out and it still smells of chemicals. My husband tolerates it because he could sleep through anything and on anything but I have resorted to the couch several nights because it just becomes too much for me and again I like a firm mattress but this thing is SOLID, not firm. Wishing there was a way to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Bilton

customer_reviews.title: An old couch is 100% more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's not really a mattress. It's a chunk of foam that feels like you are sleeping on carpet padding or a large seat cushion. I'm totally disappointed. I can't image why this mattress has gotten so many good reviews. I'm never seen such a terrible mattress. The only way it could be sold would be online. Nobody would buy this mattress if they tried it out in a store. Impossible to send back, So buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: shenry

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a firm mattress. My previous memory foam mattress has been worn down and is so soft I have to rotate it often. I feel like with softer/plush mattresses my back hurts because I don’t get the support I need. I am a back and side sleeper so sleeping on my side does hurt my shoulder a little bit. Mostly because it’s a firm mattress and it’s recommended to have a softer mattress for side sleeping. But overall this mattress is great. I am sleeping much better throughout the night, and even sitting on it it feels sturdy, like I don’t just sink way down into it. It is comfy but supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Smooley

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!! Very Disappointing bed!!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING!!!This mattress is way too firm. Let just say when you fall into this bed its like landing on the concrete floor. I mean no jumping into this bed because you will hurt yourself! Even my kids say the same thing. I am a side sleeper and it is extremely uncomfortable. It gave me a knot in my left shoulder so bad that even after several massages it will not go away. My husband kinda likes it and thinks if we got thicker pillow it will be better but I am skeptical.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McCann

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now
customer_reviews.text: After a month of sleeping on this I have convinced 2 people to buy this mattress. It is firm but that is what I wanted. I do not sink into it when I sit on it. I do not have any back pain. I have told so many people about my mattress. Anyone that comes over I have them sit on it to try it out. Hands down BEST amazon purchase EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I GOT USED TO IT.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS VERY FIRM. I ACUALLY TOOK THE 2 INCH MEMORY FOAM I ALREADY HAD OFF MY OLD BED AND PUT IT ON THIS NEW BED. BACK STILL HURT. TOOK IT OFF AND TRIED GETTING USED TO A FIRMER MATTRESS. DID THE TRICK. NO MORE BACK ACHE. IF YOU LIKE SLEEPING ON YOUR SIDE, WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS ONE. I STILL CAN'T, BUT NOW I DON'T HAVE TO DO I?
customer_reviews.author: arlene

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Wow....so far so good. It was a breeze setting up. Lol ....Most of my work came from cleaning under the bed. Initially the bed felt very different. But now as I lay and relax it's starting to feel familiar and comfortable 😊. I'm writing this review after only 2 hour but so far I haven't detected any heavy odor and from what I feel now I can imagine that it's going to be a comfortable sleep...but I'll keep you updated.......UPDATE!!!!...hard...hard...hard. This bed is fine if you like sleeping on the ground. If you're a heavy person this may be for you but I think its way too hard for the average person
customer_reviews.author: Antuan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This mattress contains 60%+ glass fiber. I had it for two months and developed dermatitis due to the exposure to my body. I broke out in hives and began feeling very ill. The manufacturer did not state anywhere on the item description. I was one of the lucky ones to keep the cover on. BUYER BEWARE: DO NOT PURCHASE UNLESS YOU WANT TO BE EXPOSED TO FIBER GLASS.
customer_reviews.author: Hamid Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bed for about 3 weeks now and I’m very pleased! I had a very soft plush mattress before and was beginning to have chronic lower back pain. Im a stomach sleeper and that doesn’t really go hand in hand with stomach sleeping. Plus the mattress was a hand me down and worn. Since sleeping on this mattress my lower back pain has subsided and I’m getting great rest. It is firm but comfortable and I sleep wonderfully on it. I also live in Hawaii and received the mattress a few days early! Would highly recommend this mattress and the price is very reasonable. I also got the 10 inch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best firm mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is like being stuck between a rock and a hard place - except the hard place is this mattress and the rock is also this mattress. There's an inch or two of sinkage, and then it's like being surround by thick tar. There's no movement or bounce. It's absolutely amazing if you sleep on your stomach and you think concrete is too soft. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS BED!! WON'T LAST PAST 5 MONTHS!!!
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months of sleeping on this "bed", the foam has not held up at all. It has been rotated countless times but there are dips in it everywhere. This is the the worst bed you could possibly buy, so I recommend not buying it.... EVER!! Don't believe the rave reviews for this bed because, unless you weigh 100 lbs, it won't hold up beyond 5 months. Absolute garbage and garbage that Amazon should not allow to be sold on their site. VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: chad b

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley - 10 Inch Chime Express Memory Foam Mattress - Bed in a Box - Queen - White
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style:10 InchWhy worry when you can chime? With the Sierra Sleep Chime Express queen mattress, you have endless possibilities for restful sleep. Soothing memory foam contours to your body, while a thick layer of firm support foam provides plentiful support and pressure relief of your body’s major pressure points. The hypoallergenic material makes it ideal for sufferers of allergies for ultimate undisturbed sleep–not to mention peace of mind. Plus, this mattress arrives in a box for quick and easy setup. Simply bring it to your room, remove the plastic wrap, and unroll. You’ll be amazed at how it fully expands within minutes. Foundation/box spring available, sold separately. Care Instructions: Product Care|Mattresses:|Rest easy with the fact that your Ashley-Sleep mattress doesn’t require much care and maintenance. For starters all Ashley-Sleep mattresses are designed to be no flip—now isn’t that a relief! |How to care for your mattress: |To help keep your Ashley-Sleep mattress clean a thin mattress protector is recommended so it breathes to allow airflow and heat dissipation. Ashley-Sleep does not recommend you use a quilted mattress pad as it will change the feel of the mattress you selected at the store. It may also trap heat that needs to escape. Don’t use dry cleaning fluid of any type on your mattress. These chemicals could damage some of the comfort and upholstery materials. Vacuuming is the only recommended cleaning method. If you must clean a stain use mild soap with cold water and apply lightly allowing the mattress time to fully air dry. Please remind the kids not to jump on their Ashley-Sleep mattress as doing so can break down the inner construction and materials.
feature_bullets: Queen size bed in a box: Restful slumber simplified; This mattress has a heavenly balance of comfort and support that contours to your body, and leaves you recharged every morning
Supportive memory foam: Mattress is designed with memory foam that contours to your body, while support foam relieves pressure points on your body. Premium stretch knit cover is a dream
Maintenance free: Made of hypoallergenic material to keep out dust mites, pollen, mold and pet dander—perfect for kids or adults who suffer from allergies
Queen size: Measures 60" W x 79.5" D x 10" H and is compatible with most queen bed frames

Ready for instant enjoyment: Arrives in a box. Simply unbox, cut the protective wrap, unroll and watch the mattress expand. Mattress is safe to sleep on immediately but can take 72+ hours for any risidual odors from packaging to dissipate and for mattress to completely expand based on ambient room temperature, humidity, air pressure & ventilation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars11,804 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
